channel.title: Upgrading [List of plugins]
channel.description:
I'm trying to get us to avoid another six month wait for the upgrade so I'm going to give us a little updated list:
Plugins (pot. updated):
http://dev.bukkit.org/server-mods/hawkeye/files/ - Hawk eye http://forums.bukkit.org/threads/sec-mech-lwc-v4-1-1-lightweight-protection-for-chests-furnaces-dispensers-and-more-1-2.967/ - LWC http://forums.bukkit.org/threads/edit-misc-tp-fun-multiverse-2-3-world-management-bukkitdev.3707/ - Multiverse (I'm not sure what MITB uses, so we'll have to wait for him to find out the version from the thread).
What other plugins do we need? I still see the quick developer option as a way to go if this is going to be an issue but we need to stay on top of our game here, and waiting six months to update isn't doing that :)

item.title: Upgrading [List of plugins]
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

http://forums.bukkit.org/threads/craftbukkit-1-2-3-r0-1-is-now-available.63380/

Looks like it, but that’s not a recommended build

As for the plugins up to now:

PvpTime - Done - http://dev.bukkit.org/server-mods/pvptime/ SpoutPLugin - Not sure what this is? xAuth - Release Date: March 16, 2012 Multiverse-Core - Looks done - http://forums.bukkit.org/threads/edit-misc-tp-fun-multiverse-2-3-world-management-bukkitdev.3707/ LWC - Done - http://forums.bukkit.org/threads/sec-mech-lwc-v4-1-1-lightweight-protection-for-chests-furnaces-dispensers-and-more-1-2.967/ PermissionsEx - Done - http://forums.bukkit.org/threads/admn-dev-permissionsex-pex-v1-19-1-tomorrow-is-today-1-2-3-r0-2.18140/ Multiverse-Netheerportals - Looks done - http://forums.bukkit.org/threads/edit-misc-tp-fun-multiverse-2-3-world-management-bukkitdev.3707/ WorldBorders - Not sure which one, theres like 20 different ones with the same name HawkEye - Done - http://dev.bukkit.org/server-mods/hawkeye/files/ Multiinv - Not updated - http://dev.bukkit.org/server-mods/multiinv/ ResidencePEX - Not sure which plugin dynmap - Not sure which plugin Multiverse-Portals - Looks done - http://forums.bukkit.org/threads/edit-misc-tp-fun-multiverse-2-3-world-management-bukkitdev.3707/

Read full topic

item.title: Upgrading [List of plugins]
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

$ ls *.jar dynmap.jar EssentialsProtect.jar HawkEye.jar MultiInv.jar Multiverse-NetherPortals.jar PermissionsEx.jar ResidencePEX.jar WorldBorder.jar Essentials.jar EssentialsSpawn.jar LWC.jar Multiverse-Core.jar Multiverse-Portals.jar PvPTime.jar SpoutPlugin.jar xAuth.jar

There you are. Has bukkit even released a recommended version yet?

Read full topic

item.title: Upgrading [List of plugins]
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

Is there a list of current plugins that we have installed currently anywhere?

Read full topic
